channel.title: Claims on Public Data
channel.description: Recent content in Claims on Public Data

item.title: COTOR Round 2
item.description: In September of 2004, the committee on the theory of risk (COTOR) created sample data and asked actuaries to fit a loss distribution to the data. https://www.casact.org/research/cotor/index.cfm?fa=round2 The file may be found here: https://www.casact.org/research/cotor/COTORChallengeClaims.xls This data is also found in the R package raw. Its appearance in that package is documented here.

item.title: Texas closed claims data
item.description: The data may be found here: http://www.tdi.texas.gov/reports/report4.html#closed. this data appears in the monograph: “A Machine-Learning Approach to Parameter Estimation”
